abstract: The range, in frames per second, of randomized frame rates for particle image animation. Animatable.
overview:
## Discussion

Setting a nonzero value for this property randomizes the effect of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/imageSequenceFrameRate] property. SceneKit randomly adjusts the animation speed for each particle by up to half the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/imageSequenceFrameRateVariation] value. For example, if the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/imageSequenceFrameRate] value is `10.0` frames per second and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/imageSequenceFrameRateVariation] value is `10.0` seconds, each particle animates at a random rate between `5.0` and `15.0` frames per second.

The default value is `0.0` frames per second, specifying no randomization.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

# imageSequenceFrameRateVariation

**Instance Property**

The range, in frames per second, of randomized frame rates for particle image animation. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var imageSequenceFrameRateVariation: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting a nonzero value for this property randomizes the effect of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/imageSequenceFrameRate] property. SceneKit randomly adjusts the animation speed for each particle by up to half the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/imageSequenceFrameRateVariation] value. For example, if the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/imageSequenceFrameRate] value is `10.0` frames per second and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/imageSequenceFrameRateVariation] value is `10.0` seconds, each particle animates at a random rate between `5.0` and `15.0` frames per second.

The default value is `0.0` frames per second, specifying no randomization.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

## Animating Particle Images

- **imageSequenceRowCount**: The number of rows for treating the particle image as a grid of animation frames.
- **imageSequenceColumnCount**: The number of columns for treating the particle image as a grid of animation frames.
- **imageSequenceInitialFrame**: The index of the first frame in a particle image animation. Animatable.
- **imageSequenceInitialFrameVariation**: The range of randomized initial frames for particle image animation. Animatable.
- **imageSequenceFrameRate**: The rate, in frames per second, of particle image animation. Animatable.
- **imageSequenceAnimationMode**: The animation mode for particle image animation.
- **SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode**: Options for animating each particle with a sequence of images, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/imageSequenceAnimationMode] property.
